name: Secrets of the Past: Dion
description: Become an archaeologist and lead an excavation at the ancient city of Dion! In this casual simulation game, your goal is to unearth and exhibit the real treasures of the Villa of Dionysus. Will you manage to do so before the heavy rain season?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 64-bit Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated 520 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
